{"7f672caa-a126-463c-8ec9-595e46aef40b":{"id":"7f672caa-a126-463c-8ec9-595e46aef40b","name":"[TextContent(type=text, text=

<current_file>
```markdown:README.md, lines=ALL(1-42)
# Home Harmony

Home Harmony app nhắm đến người dùng đang chuẩn bị mua sắm đồ nội thất để tân trang cho ngôi nhà của mình, chúng tôi cung cấp đa dạng sản phẩm


![image](https://github.com/cuocdart18/eKMA/assets/111178266/729fee2a-27a5-401a-9c0e-1499a59df79e)


## Tech Stack

- Navigation component 
- Firebase Auth 
- Firebase Firestore 
- Firebase Storage 
- MVVM & LiveData 
- Coroutines 
- View binding 
- Glide
- Hilt-Dagger


## Features
- Đăng ký, đăng nhập, quên mật khẩu
- Xem sản phẩm theo từng danh mục
- Xem chi tiết sản phẩm
- Thêm sản phẩm vào giỏ hàng
- Theo dõi đơn hàng
- Chỉnh sửa profile cá nhân

### Chức năng trong quá trình hoàn thành
- Chat với chủ cửa hàng
- Login bằng tài khoản google
- Chỉnh sửa mật khẩu
- Chỉnh sửa địa chỉ
## Screenshots

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/7a7a4fb1-4082-4a52-b075-45642d2dfc18)

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/943cf4ba-daf9-4afd-99fa-5fca531342af)

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/70db23dd-5508-4c05-922c-6e2efb2a18a7)

```
</current_file>
</additional_data>

```markdown:README.md, lines=ALL(1-42)
# Home Harmony

Home Harmony app nhắm đến người dùng đang chuẩn bị mua sắm đồ nội thất để tân trang cho ngôi nhà của mình, chúng tôi cung cấp đa dạng sản phẩm


![image](https://github.com/cuocdart18/eKMA/assets/111178266/729fee2a-27a5-401a-9c0e-1499a59df79e)


## Tech Stack

- Navigation component 
- Firebase Auth 
- Firebase Firestore 
- Firebase Storage 
- MVVM & LiveData 
- Coroutines 
- View binding 
- Glide
- Hilt-Dagger


## Features
- Đăng ký, đăng nhập, quên mật khẩu
- Xem sản phẩm theo từng danh mục
- Xem chi tiết sản phẩm
- Thêm sản phẩm vào giỏ hàng
- Theo dõi đơn hàng
- Chỉnh sửa profile cá nhân

### Chức năng trong quá trình hoàn thành
- Chat với chủ cửa hàng
- Login bằng tài khoản google
- Chỉnh sửa mật khẩu
- Chỉnh sửa địa chỉ
## Screenshots

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/7a7a4fb1-4082-4a52-b075-45642d2dfc18)

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/943cf4ba-daf9-4afd-99fa-5fca531342af)

![image](https://github.com/Jkiss123/NoteApp/assets/111178266/70db23dd-5508-4c05-922c-6e2efb2a18a7)

```
</current_file>
</additional_data>

Could not install Gradle distribution from 'https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip'.
Reason: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Connect timed out
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The error: 
```
Could not install Gradle distribution from 'https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip'.
Reason: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Connect timed out
```
means your development environment (probably Android Studio or a similar tool) is trying to download Gradle, but is unable to connect — likely due to a network timeout. Here’s how you can resolve this:

## Possible Causes & Solutions

### 1. Internet Connection
Double-check that your computer is connected to the internet and has a stable connection.

### 2. Services Blocked (Firewall/VPN/Proxy)
- If you are on a corporate/work network, sometimes firewalls or proxies can block Gradle downloads.
- Solution: Try connecting to a different network (your home Wi-Fi, mobile hotspot, etc.), or configure your proxy/firewall to allow communication to `services.gradle.org`.

### 3. Gradle Offline Mode
- In Android Studio: Go to `File > Settings > Build, Execution, Deployment > Gradle`, and make sure "Offline work" is **unchecked**.

### 4. Manually Download the Gradle Distribution

You can manually download the Gradle zip, extract it, and point your project to it:

**Steps:**
1. Download https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip using an external browser.
2. Unzip it to a folder, e.g., `/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2`.
3. In Android Studio, open `gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties` in your project and set:
 ```
 distributionUrl=file:/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2
 ```
 Or if possible, just change your Gradle path in your system/IDE to this folder.

### 5. Retry Build After Fixes
Once you've addressed the above, press “Sync Project with Gradle Files” or re-run your build.

---

Let me know if you need detailed step-by-step instructions for any of the above solutions, or if you get a new error after trying these fixes!"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To fix this Gradle distribution download timeout problem, here's what I will do:

1. Guide you to manually download the Gradle 8.2 zip file.
2. Show you how to extract it and configure your project to use the local Gradle distribution.
3. Update your `gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties` to use your local copy instead of the online URL.

Let's get started!

---

## Step 1: Download Gradle 8.2 Bin Zip

1. Open this link in your browser: 
 [https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip](https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip)

2. Save the file to a local folder, e.g., `/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2-bin.zip`.

## Step 2: Extract the Zip

- Extract the contents to `/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2` using Finder or the terminal:
 ```bash
 mkdir -p /Users/may/gradle/
 unzip /Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2-bin.zip -d /Users/may/gradle/
 ```

Now you should have: 
`/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2/`

## Step 3: Update `gradle-wrapper.properties`

I will check your `gradle-wrapper.properties` file and prepare an edit to point to the local path.

"}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"call_TigIYJlC1GtmNBUt2l76SdzG","type":"function","function":{"name":"read_file","arguments":"{"target_file":"gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"call_TigIYJlC1GtmNBUt2l76SdzG","content":"#Tue Mar 19 22:16:09 ICT 2024

distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip
zipStoreBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME
zipStorePath=wrapper/dists

```
@@ -2,5 +2,5 @@

+distributionUrl=file:///Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2-bin.zip

```

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I have updated your project configuration so that Gradle will use the local file `/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2-bin.zip` instead of attempting to download it from the internet. Here’s what to do next:

### 1. Download and Extract Gradle (if you haven’t yet)
- Download the file: [https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip](https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.2-bin.zip)
- Place it at: `/Users/may/gradle/gradle-8.2-bin.zip`

### 2. Rebuild/Sync Your Project
- In Android Studio, choose “Sync Project with Gradle Files”.
- Or, try your build again from command line.

If you see a different error, let me know and I’ll help fix that as well! If you need the exact terminal commands to extract the zip or further instructions, just ask."}]}]}}
